Interface ProtocolDetector

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultProtocolDetector
public interface ProtocolDetector
Detects the application protocol for a flow based on early payload and port hints.
Since:
RADAR 0.1-doc

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    ProtocolId
    classify(FiveTuple flow, int serverPortHint, byte[] prefacePeek)
    Classifies a flow using orientation hints and the captured byte preface.

  • Method Details

    • classify

      ProtocolId classify(FiveTuple flow, int serverPortHint, byte[] prefacePeek)
      Classifies a flow using orientation hints and the captured byte preface.
      Parameters:
      flow - five-tuple describing the connection
      serverPortHint - candidate server port derived from connection orientation
      prefacePeek - up to a protocol-specific number of bytes from the start of the stream
      Returns:
      detected protocol id, or ProtocolId.UNKNOWN when inconclusive
      Since:
      RADAR 0.1-doc
